text:
e="preserve">"La Venganza de Cucamonga" is the sixth album by Cuca, a Mexican hard rock band originally from Guadalajara, Jalisco.
After a long hiatus from recording, Cuca returned in 2015 with this, their sixth album. Guitarist Alex Otaola replaced Galo Ochoa. The album was recorded, mixed, and mastered by Arturo 2T Perales at Oigo Studios in Guadalajara. The album received a 2015 Latin Grammy nomination.
Singles include: "Arre Lulú", "Más Daño", and "En el Nombre del Rocanrol".
